Posts.Content: doon8457 wrote: I am 63 and had a fairly large lump pop up a few weeks ago overnight. It is in the area where I had a papilloma removed 6-7 years ago. I thought perhaps it was another papilloma or scar tissue but now my nipple tingles and I just developed flakiness around my nipple. I have no insurance to trying to get financial aid to get diagnosed but not an easy process. Has anyone else had papillomas removed and then this happen? Thank you Log in to post a reply
